data.actual_result: Quick switcher leaves an empty space at the bottom ONLY when doing the reproducible steps above accurately!
data.expected_result: Quick switcher should adjust itself to size of Discord app while in split screen mode.
data.short_description: New quick switcher window leaves a bit of space at the bottom while in split screen mode.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord and toggle split screen mode. - Resize Discord so that it occupies 1/3rd (minimum) size of the screen and tap on it to focus the Discord app. - Slide from left to right, to open side panel and click on quick switcher icon at the bottom. - Notice the keyboard pops up, close it using navigation back button on your device. - Now at the end, resize Discord to 1/2 screen size (occupying half of the screen) while the quick switcher is open and keyboard closed. - Retry from step one if you don't get it at the first time.
